Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Establishes a state university of New York pilot program to encourage individuals in college to enter the financial planning industry
Summary: Establishes a state university of New York career pilot program to encourage individuals in college to enter the financial planning industry; utilizes campus resources to encourage a well-rounded program and diverse student involvement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a state university of New York pilot program to encourage individuals in college to enter the financial planning industry; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
